details: All 1st to 4th Job skills can be maxed
Put one SP into each skill first and then max each skill in this order
For any skills that have prerequisites, follow them first before following build path

hyperBuild.recommended:
• Empowered Harmony and Boss Rush Harmony
  • Guardbreaking Clones
  • Hasty Ghost Flame
  • Hasty Vortex

nodeInfo.recommended:
Primary Trio
Secondary Trio
Tertiary Trio
  • Any combination of these skills are good but preferred from same category as you want to max primary first and so on
  • 6 Boost Nodes total are needed to reach Master Level 60 for these skills (with Matrix Points used)
    • Nodes with the same Main Skill (skill at the top) cannot be equipped at the same time
nodeInfo.possible:
• Skills below boost multiple skills
  • Humanity: As-You-Will Fan and Gold-Banded Cudgel
  • Talisman: Evil-Sealing Gourd and Thousand-Ton Stone
  • Earth: Ground-Shattering Wave and Stone Tremor
  • Talisman: Clone and Sage: Tai Yu Clone
  • Heaven: Iron Fan Gale and Consuming Flames

extraContent.title: Talisman Energy and Scroll Energy & Dark Sight
extraContent.content:
Hoyoung has two secondary resources called Talisman Energy and Scroll Energy that are used for Talisman Skills and Scroll Skills. In Hoyoung's gauge, the inner circle is the Talisman Energy and the outer ring is the Scroll Energy. Talisman Energy is charged by using Attribute Skills and Scroll Energy is charged by using Talisman Skills and Attribute Skills.

Hoyoung's Attribute Skills are split into 3 different attributes, Humanity, Earth, and Heaven. On Hoyoung's gauge, you'll notice three orbs, this is your Attribute Combo, each representing a different attribute. Using a unique attribute will increase the stage of your Attribute Combo and grant bonus Talisman Energy. Once you consume all three orbs (Stage 3), the Attribute Combo resets

Talisman Energy is unlocked at 1st Job while Scroll Energy is unlocked at 3rd Job

Dark Sight

Credits to the Night Walker Discord for the list of attacks avoidable with Dark Sight. For an actively maintained version, please check out the Night Walker Discord

In 2nd Job, using the clone version of Attribute Skills will trigger Out of Sight to briefly grant Dark Sight state. Below is a list of avoidable attacks that have been tested:

BossAvoidable Attack
All EnemiesTouch Damage
HillaLightning Bolt, Flame Breath
CygnusAll minions (including instructors) touch damage + attacks
Princess No(Miroku/4F - All attacks except Infinite Flame), Butterfly Throw (except Black Butterfly Seduce), Sakura Shower
MagnusImmobilizing Gas, Falling Debris, Dash
PapulatusHand Smash, Floor Rift, Timed Cursed/Seal (both cast + seal), Falling Debris
GolluxReverse/99% Bomb
Crimson QueenBurn DoT (gain stacks but no damage taken)
PierreFalling Hats, Fire Spin (Blue Form)
Von BonFalling Debris
VellumFalling Stun Rocks
Pink Bean (Statuses)All attacks except Laser, Poison Clouds, Mini Pink Beans
Pink BeanBlue ground attack, Big Bang, Mini Pink Beans
LotusFalling Debris (except platforms), Green Vaccum (prevents slow/grounding)
DamienYellow(p1)/Red(p2) Falling Fireballs, Dash(p2), Thorn Bind (Can be done reactively when he disappears w/ Monster Silhouettes enabled in settings)
WillP1 (Segment Test) Red Meteors, P2 Web, P2 Dash
Guardian Angel SlimeSlime Pool DoT, Slime minion touch damage (not their attacks, i.e. Pink Slime's seduce), Magma Slime touch + landing on head
Verus HillaCorpse DoT
GloomFalling Debris
DarknellDebris (Both Vertical + Horizontal), Small Minion touch damage (except sword swing)
Black MageP1 Knights' Dash (still applies curse), P1 Red Lightning, Falling Debris (Vertical), Diagonal/Rolling Debris (only while midair), P3 Down FMA
SerenDash, Falling Debris (P1, P2 Sunset); still adds sun gauge
Kalos P1Bombs

primary.name: Return to Cheong-woon
primary.shortDesc: Returns you to Cheong-woon Valley.\nCooldown: 600 sec
details: Skill is gained as you complete the storyline

primary.name: Shapeshift
primary.shortDesc: Hides your ears, tail, and face stripes.\nCooldown: 10 sec
details: Skill is gained as you complete the storyline

primary.name: Exclusive Spell
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Attack Power and Magic ATT: +4%, Duration: 40 min
details: To obtain this skill, complete Hoyoung's storyline and the quest 'Sealing the Fiends: The Final Act 2'
Affects all nearby players
Has a cooldown (2 hrs)

primary.name: Spirit Affinity
primary.shortDesc: Minion Duration +10%

primary.name: Fiend Seal
primary.shortDesc: Attack Power: +10%, Final Damage: +10%
details: This skill is gained and leveled up by completing the Hoyoung storyline

primary.name: Talisman Energy
primary.shortDesc: - Successful hits with your Heaven, Earth, and Humanity skills charge your Talisman Energy.\n- With every successful hit, grants a combo stage for that attribute and Talisman Energy charge (stage 1: 10, stage 2: 15, and stage 3: 20).\n- The combo stage resets after reaching stage 3.
primary.desc: Whenever you damage an enemy with an Attribute Skill (Heaven, Earth or Humanity skills), you charge your Talisman Energy
details:
Each time you use a Heaven, Earth or Humanity skill for the first time, you gain bonus Talisman Energy
  • Once all three types are used, the count will reset
Right-clicking the skill will toggle the UI visual effect ON/OFF

primary.name: Humanity: As-You-Will-Fan
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 16, Max Enemies Hit: 5, Damage: 90%, Number of Attacks: 5 times, Against Enemies Struck by Fan: Final Damage +5%
primary.desc: Swings your fan forward
details: Enemies hit by the actual fan part of the skill take increased %Final Damage

primary.name: Talisman: Evil-Sealing Gourd
primary.shortDesc: Talisman Energy Cost: 100, Max Enemies Swallowed: 4. Launch swallowed enemies by pressing the skill key again.\nAttacks up to 6 enemies that are absorbed or within range of the launch attack for 250% damage 6 times.\nBoss Damage: +20%.
primary.desc: Swallows up nearby enemies into your gourd
details: Pressing the Skill Key again launches all enemies swallowed
Cannot swallow boss monsters, stationary monsters or monsters too higher level than you
Deals increased %Boss Damage

primary.name: Graceful Flight
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 5, allows you to jump a greater distance
primary.desc: Double jump skill
details: Can be assigned a Key Slot or activated by pressing jump twice
Can be used up to twice in a row

primary.name: Nimbus Cloud
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 10, Temporarily gain the power to fly.
primary.desc: Allows you to fly temporarily
details: Can be activated by holding the Skill Key or holding the Jump Key and pressing the Up Arrow Key together
You can move around by pressing the Arrow Keys
Right-clicking the skill will toggle a lock to prevent it from activating with the Arrow Keys
Unlocked by completing main storyline

primary.name: Light Steps
primary.shortDesc: Speed:+20, Max Speed: +20

primary.name: Shrouding Mist
primary.shortDesc: Avoidability +15%

primary.name: Earth: Ground-Shattering Wave
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 40, Damage: 100%, Number of Attacks: 4, Max Enemies Hit: 6
primary.desc: Releases a shockwave forward
details:
Pressing the Forward Arrow Key and the Skill Key again, causes you to dash forward
  • If nothing is press, a clone instead dashes forward
Clone version is unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Talisman: Clone
primary.shortDesc: Talisman Energy Cost: 100, For 200 sec, create 3 clone(s) when attacking, Each clone attacks for 60% damage 4 times, Damage against Normal Monsters: +20%\nClone creation has a 1.5 sec cooldown
primary.desc: While active, your attacks creates clones that attack nearby enemies
details: Deals increased %Damage to regular monsters
Summoning skills will not create clones
Prioritizes bosses with the highest HP first
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Ritual Fan Acceleration
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 10, Duration: 200 sec, Ritual Fan Attack Speed: +2
primary.desc: Increases Attack Speed (by 2 stages)

primary.name: Ritual Fan Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Ritual Fan Mastery: +50%, Attack Power: +25

primary.name: Out of Sight
primary.shortDesc: Using Ground-Shattering Wave (Clone), Stone Tremor (Clone), Iron Fan Gale (Clone), or Consuming Flames (Clone) hides you for 2 sec, Using an attack skill while hidden will reveal you.\nIf you dodge an attack that deals damage proportional to Max HP, your remaining time to hide will be reduced by 20% of the maximum.\n[Passive Effects: Avoidability +20%]
primary.desc: Upon using the clone version of Attribute Skills will grant Dark Sight state
details: While in the Dark Sight state, if you dodge an attack that deals %Max HP, the duration is reduced slightly
Additionally, permanently increases %Avoidability

primary.name: Third Eye
primary.shortDesc: Critical Rate: +30%, Critical Damage: +10%

primary.name: Heavenly Body
primary.shortDesc: Jump: +20\nIncreases the duration and flight speed for the Nimbus Cloud skill

primary.name: Fortune Fitness
primary.shortDesc: LUK: +60

primary.name: Scroll Energy
primary.shortDesc: - Gain 15 Scroll Energy upon successful hits with your Heaven, Earth, and Humanity skills.\n- Gain 200 Scroll Energy every time you use a Talisman Skill.\n- When an attribute skill is used, if it is different from the previously used attribute, the final damage of that magic is increased by 5%.
primary.desc: Whenever you damage an enemy with an Attribute Skill or Talisman Skill, you charge your Scroll Energy
details: Additionally, using a different attribute from the one previously used will increase that attack's %Final Damage

primary.name: Heaven: Iron Fan Gale
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 45, Damage: 150%, Number of Attacks: 5, Max Enemies Hit: 6
primary.desc: Leap into the air and blow a gale downwards
details:
Press the Forward Arrow Key and the Skill Key again causes you to leap forward
  • If nothing is pressed, a clone instead will leap forward
Clone version is unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Earth: Stone Tremor
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 70, Max Enemies Hit: 10, Damage: 180%, Number of Attacks: 6, Stun Duration for Normal Monsters: 5 sec\nCooldown: 6 sec
primary.desc: Stones emerge from the ground damaging and stunning nearby enemies
details:
Press the Left or Right Key and the Skill Key again will teleport you towards that direction
  • If nothing is pressed, a clone instead will dash forward
Only usable while on the ground
Clone version is unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Talisman: Seeking Ghost Flame
primary.shortDesc: Talisman Energy Cost: 100, Flame Summon Duration: 40 sec, Enemy Targeting Interval: 1.8 sec, Max Enemies Hit: 5, Damage: 210%, Number of Attacks: 5
primary.desc: Summons a flame spirit that roams around and attacks enemies
details: Prioritizes bosses with the highest HP first
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Scroll: Degeneration
primary.shortDesc: Scroll Energy Cost: 900, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 450%, Number of Attacks: 8, Boss Damage: +20%\nTransformation Duration (Normal Enemies Only): 60 sec, Enemy DEF: -20%.
primary.desc: Transforms nearby enemies into frogs, bug and other creatures
details: Transformed enemies have reduced %DEF
Cannot transform bosses but deals increased %Boss Damage and are affected by reduced %DEF
Reduction to %DEF can be considered as %Ignore DEF

primary.name: Attainment
primary.shortDesc:
Humanity: As-You-Will Fan Damage: +205%p
Ground-Shattering Wave Damage: +100%p
Talisman: Evil-Sealing Gourd Damage: +200%p
Talisman: Clone Damage: +60%p

primary.name: Asura
primary.shortDesc: Attack Power: +50, Critical Rate: +10%, Critical Damage: +20%, Boss Damage: +20%, Enemy DEF Ignored: +10%

primary.name: Diamond Body
primary.shortDesc: Max HP: +20%, Knockback Resistance: +40%\nDamage Taken: -15%

primary.name: Balanced Breath
primary.shortDesc: Abnormal Status Resistance: +30, All Elemental Resistance: +30%\nRestores 3% of Max HP and Max MP after completing attribute combo stage 3

primary.name: Heaven: Consuming Flames
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 90, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 370%, Number of Attacks: 6, Usage of Graceful Flight and Nimbus Cloud is reset after using this skill\nCooldown: 8 sec
primary.desc: Creates a burst of flames that launches upwards
details:
Pressing the Up Arrow Key and the Skill Key again causes you to dash upwards
  • If nothing is pressed, a clone instead will dashe upwards
and can be used again after using this skill
Can only be used in the air
Clone version is unaffected by Damage Reflect
Unaffected by cooldown resets

primary.name: Humanity: Gold-Banded Cudgel
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 100, Max Enemies Hit: 10, Damage: 282%, Number of Attacks: 10, Final Blow Damage: 458%, Final Blow Number of Attacks: 8\nBoss Damage: +30%\nCooldown: 11 sec
primary.desc: Strikes forward and then delivers a final swing attack
details: The final swing deals increased damage
Deals increased %Boss Damage

primary.name: Thousand-Ton Stone
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 50, Drops straight down when used in the air, Max Enemies Hit: 7, Damage: 275%, Number of Attacks: 6.\nAttacked enemies Bleed for 270% damage every 1 sec for 10 sec\nCooldown: 0.5 sec.
primary.desc: Transform into a stone that drops down crushing enemies and apply a damaging bleeding debuff
details: Can only be used in the air
You can activate this skill by pressing the Skill Key or tapping the Down Arrow key twice
Right-clicking the skill will toggle a lock to prevent it from activating with the Arrow Keys
Can be linked while using or

primary.name: Talisman: Warp Gate
primary.shortDesc: Talisman Energy Cost: 100, Warp Gate Duration: 100 sec\nUsing the skill again teleports you to the gate, Using the skill near the gate teleports you to your previous location. Teleport and Opening a New Gate Cooldown: 5 sec\n[Passive Effect: Avoidability Chance: +20%]
primary.desc: Creates a gate at your position that you can teleport back to while it is active
details: [Passive]: Permanently increases %Avoidability

To teleport, press the Skill Key again
  • After teleporting, using the skill again while near the gate teleports you back to your previous lcoation
Pressing the Up Arrow Key and Skill Key together will consume Talisman Energy to move the gate to your position

primary.name: Scroll: Star Vortex
primary.shortDesc: Scroll Energy Cost: 900, Creates a vortex that deals 256% damage 6 times for 40 sec\nYou can absorb 1 energy for every 4 successful hits up to 9, Attacking boss monsters absorbs 3 times the energy\nUsing the skill again will make the vortex disappear and restore 5% of the Max HP and Max MP of party member for each energy absorbed.
primary.desc: Creates a vortex on the ground that damages nearby enemies
details:
While the skill is active, you accumulate Energy from enemies hit by the vortex
  • Pressing the Skill Key again, or when the vortex disappears, you and your party members will restore %HP/MP based on how much Energy was stored
  • Attacking bosses will generate more Energy
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Scroll: Butterfly Dream
primary.shortDesc: Scroll Energy Cost: 900, Duration: 100 sec, Final Damage: +10%, Summons 5 butterflies that deal 297% damage when you attack.\nButterfly Summon Cooldown: 1 sec\n[Passive Effect: Scroll: Degeneration Damage: +400%p]
primary.desc: While active, gain increased %Final Damage and your attacks create butterflies that seek and attack nearby enemies
details: [Passive]: Permanently increases %p Damage of
Prioritizes bosses with the highest HP first
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Anima Warrior
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 70, Increases all stats assigned APs by 15% for 900 sec

primary.name: Anima Hero's Will
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Cooldown: 300 sec
primary.desc: Removes certain abnormal status effects and become immune to Abnormal Status for 3 secs
details: Unaffected by Combat Orders

primary.name: Advanced Ritual Fan Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Ritual Fan Mastery: +70%, Attack Power: +40, Final Damage: +29%
details: Increases %Weapon Mastery provided
Additionally, increases %Final Damage and grants flat Attack

primary.name: Enlightenment
primary.shortDesc:
Damage: +10%
Humanity: As-You-Will Fan Damage: +307%p
Earth: Ground-Shattering Wave Damage: +220%p
Heaven: Iron Fan Gale Damage: +141%p
Earth: Stone Tremor Damage: +245%p
Talisman: Evil-Sealing Gourd Damage: +550%p
Talisman: Clone Damage: +110%p
Talisman: Seeking Ghost Flame Damage: +215%p
details: Increases %p Damage increased provided
Now increases %Damage

primary.name: Dragon's Eye
primary.shortDesc: Attack Power: +10, Final Damage: +10%, Critical Rate: +10%, Critical Damage: +10%, Enemy DEF Ignored: +10%, Avoidability: +10%, Knockback Resistance: +60%

hyperPassive.name: Empowered Harmony
details: Increases the %Damage of , , , , , and

hyperPassive.name: Piercing Harmony
details: Increases %Ignore DEF for , , , , , and

hyperPassive.name: Boss Rush Harmony
details: Increases the %Boss Damage of , , , , , and

hyperActive.name: Sage: Tai Yu's Miracle Tonic
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 800. Completely restores Talisman and Scroll Energy as soon as it's used. For 12 sec, periodically restores Talisman Energy by 35 and Scroll Energy by 350.\nCooldown: 90 sec
hyperActive.desc: When used, fully restores Talisman and Scroll Energy
details: While active, periodically restores Talisman and Scroll Energy

hyperActive.name: Sage: Dream of Shangri-La
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 10% of Max MP, Invincible while casting and while holding down the key, Max Skill Duration: 20 sec\nWhen the skill effects end, cooldown is reduced by 9.3 sec for each second of remaining duration.\nCooldown: 200 sec
details:
Can be used while in the air or while using 1st to 4th Job Skills
  • For only during the final attack can this skill be used
Depending on how long the skill was held, the cooldown will be shorter
Unaffected by cooldown resets and cooldown reduction

hyperActive.name: Sage: Tai Yu Clone
hyperActive.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 200, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 800%, Number of Attacks: 8
Stun Duration: 11 sec
Stun duration can increase up to 100% based on the damage inflicted with the attack.
Cooldown: 180 sec
hyperActive.desc: A clone charges towards enemies that binds enemies in its path

fifthMain.name: Sage: Clone Rampage
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: 1000, For 30 sec, create 10 clone(s) when attacking, Each clone attacks for 400%p more damage than Talisman: Clone 4 times\nClone creation has a 1.5 sec cooldown\nCooldown: 180 sec
fifthMain.desc: While active, the number of clones created is increased and are more powerful
details: Can only be used while is active
Prioritizes bosses with the highest HP first

fifthMain.name: Scroll: Tiger of Songyu
fifthMain.shortDesc:
Scroll Energy Cost: 900, Duration: 57 sec, Max Enemies Hit: 12, Damage: 1800%, Number of Attacks: 8
When you reach attribute combo stage 3, its next attack is a roar that periodically deals 700% damage 4 times.
Tiger's attacks have a cooldown of 3 sec
Cooldown: 180 sec
fifthMain.desc: Summons a tiger that attacks nearby enemies
details: Each time you use all 3 of the Attribute Skill types for your Talisman Energy, the tiger's next attack will be a mighty roar
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

fifthMain.name: Sage: Wrath of Gods
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1000, Duration: 30 sec, Damage: +70%
The gods strike once per 12 successful attacks, hitting up to 10 enemies for 1700% damage 8 times, Cooldown: 1.5 sec
Using the skill again will immediately end its effects and summon the gods at once, creating 6 shockwave(s) that attacks up to 15 enemies for 2000% damage 12 times.
You are invincible while summoning the gods. This skill negates attack ignore and attack reflection effects.
Upon summoning the gods, damage for Heaven, Earth, and Humanity Skills, as well as Clone/True skills, increases by 20% for 30 sec.
Cooldown: 180 sec
fifthMain.desc: While active, increases your %Damage and your attacks periodically trigger giant gods to attack nearby enemies
details:
Pressing the Skill Key again will end the skill early and release a massive attack
  • While casting, you are invincible
  • After the final attack, gain a buff that increases %Damage of Attribute Skills
  • Ignores Attack Ignore and Damage Reflect
Prioritizes bosses with the highest HP first
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

fifthMain.name: Sage: Three Paths Apparition
fifthMain.shortDesc: Passive Effect: clones appears to attack up to 4 enemies with 1250% damage 6 times, cooldown: 5 sec\nActive Effect: MP Cost: 1250, passive effect can activate 2 times without cooldown for 30 sec, then cooldown of 2 sec applied afterwards, Cooldown: 100 sec
fifthMain.desc: Using an Attribute Skill will periodically create an additional clone attack
details:
[Active Buff]: While active, two additional attacks will be created instead of one
  • Additionally, each time you use all 3 of the Attribute Skill types for your Talisman Energy, one Attribute Skill's cooldown will be reset
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

masteryCore.name: Universal Harmony
masteryCore.shortDesc: Upon reaching a stage 3 combo for Heaven, Earth, and Humanity skills 3 times, enhances the next HEXA Heaven: Consuming Flames, HEXA Earth: Stone Tremor, or HEXA Humanity: Gold-Banded Cudgel\nAfter using enhanced Heaven, Earth, and Humanity skills, Final Damage: +10% for 40 sec\nCooldown: 30 sec

masteryCore.name: HEXA Heaven: Consuming Flames
masteryCore.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 120, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 555%, Number of Attacks: 6, Usage of Graceful Flight and Nimbus Cloud is reset after using this skill
Cooldown: 8 sec
------Enhanced Consuming Flames------
MP Cost: 120, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 810%, Number of Attacks: 6, Usage of Graceful Flight and Nimbus Cloud is reset after using this skill
Flame Emblem Duration: 15 sec, the flame explodes on the spot when 3 attacks from Hoyoung land, Max Enemies Hit: 10, Damage: 685%, Number of Attacks: 5
Cooldown: 8 sec

masteryCore.name: HEXA Earth: Stone Tremor
masteryCore.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 105, Max Enemies Hit: 10, Damage: 650%, Number of Attacks: 6, Stun Duration for Normal Monsters: 5 sec
Cooldown: 6 sec
------Enhanced Stone Tremor------
MP Cost: 105, Max Enemies Hit: 10, Damage: 1010%, Number of Attacks: 6, Stun Duration for Normal Enemies: 5 sec
A bright moon rises, Duration: 5 sec, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 730%, Number of Attacks: 5
Cooldown: 6 sec

masteryCore.name: HEXA Humanity: Gold-Banded Cudgel
masteryCore.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 125, Max Enemies Hit: 10, Damage: 455%, Number of Attacks: 10, Final Blow Damage: 830%, Final Blow Number of Attacks: 8
Boss Damage: +30%
Cooldown: 11 sec
------Enhanced Gold-Banded Cudgel------
MP Cost: 125, Max Enemies Hit: 10, Damage: 725%, Number of Attacks: 10, Final Blow Damage: 1320%, Final Blow Number of Attacks: 8
Goblin Energy Damage: 825%, Goblin Energy Number of Attacks: 8
Boss Damage: +30%
Cooldown: 11 sec

originSkill.name: Sage: Apothesis
originSkill.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1500, invincible during casting
Hold the key down to deal 1013% damage to up to 15 enemies 8 times for up to 5 sec. Then deals 1240% damage 15 times through Sage.
When the held key is released or the duration ends, a cataclysmic change occurs 61 times to deal 1077% damage to up to 15 enemies 14 times.\NApplies the Universe buff upon casting.
Cooldown: 360 sec

meta: Hoyoung is LUK thief class part of the Anima class group. Hoyoung has two secondary resources called Talisman Energy and Scroll Energy
